resources.string: => Mobility is the industry of transporting people and goods.\n => Revenue in the Ride-hailing and Taxi segment is projected to reach US$12.77bn in 2023.\n => Revenue is expected to show an annual growth rate (2023-2027) of 0.12%, resulting in a projected market volume of US$12.83bn by 2027.

=> E-commerce or Electronic commerce is the trading of goods and services on the Internet.\n => The global ecommerce growth rate for 2023 is forecast at 10.4% ,bring global ecommerce sales worldwide to $6.3 trillion.\n => India is the 8th largest market for ecommerce with a predicted revenue of US$79,923.8 million by 2023.

=> Collaboration in the context of business allow people to work together in achieving a defined ,common business purpose.\n => The global enterprise collaboration market size grew from $47.74 billion in 2022 to $54.88 billion in 2023 at a compound annual growth rate(CAGR) of 15.0%.
